verses.text: The \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came again unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, there were \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w women|strong="H0802"\w*, the \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* of \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*:

And they committed \w whoredoms|strong="H2181"\w* in \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*; they committed \w whoredoms|strong="H2181"\w* in their \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*: there were their \w breasts|strong="H7699"\w* \w pressed|strong="H4600"\w*, and there they \w bruised|strong="H6213"\w* the \w teats|strong="H1717"\w* of their \w virginity|strong="H1331"\w*.

And the \w names|strong="H8034"\w* of them \add were\add* \w Aholah|strong="H0170"\w* the \w elder|strong="H1419"\w*, and \w Aholibah|strong="H0172"\w* her \w sister|strong="H0269"\w*: and they were mine, and they \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* and \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*. Thus \add were\add* their \w names|strong="H8034"\w*; \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w* \add is\add* \w Aholah|strong="H0170"\w*, and \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w Aholibah|strong="H0172"\w*.\f + \fr 23.4 \ft Aholah: that is, His tent, or, tabernacle\f*\f + \fr 23.4 \ft Aholibah: that is, My tabernacle in her\f*

And \w Aholah|strong="H0170"\w* played the \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w* when she was \w mine|strong="H8478"\w*; and she \w doted|strong="H5689"\w* on her \w lovers|strong="H0157"\w*, on the \w Assyrians|strong="H0804"\w* \add her\add* \w neighbours|strong="H7138"\w*,

\add Which were\add* \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* with \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, \w captains|strong="H6346"\w* and \w rulers|strong="H5461"\w*, all of them \w desirable|strong="H2531"\w* young \w men|strong="H0970"\w*, \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w* \w riding|strong="H7392"\w* upon \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*.

Thus she \w committed|strong="H5414"\w* her \w whoredoms|strong="H8457"\w* with them, with all them \add that were\add* the \w chosen|strong="H4005"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*, and with all on whom she \w doted|strong="H5689"\w*: with all their \w idols|strong="H1544"\w* she \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w* herself.\f + \fr 23.7 \ft committed…: Heb. bestowed her whoredoms upon them\f*\f + \fr 23.7 \ft the chosen…: Heb. the choice of the children of Asshur\f*

Neither \w left|strong="H5800"\w* she her \w whoredoms|strong="H8457"\w* \add brought\add* from \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: for in her \w youth|strong="H5271"\w* they \w lay|strong="H7901"\w* with her, and they \w bruised|strong="H6213"\w* the \w breasts|strong="H1717"\w* of her \w virginity|strong="H1331"\w*, and \w poured|strong="H8210"\w* their \w whoredom|strong="H8457"\w* upon her.

Wherefore I have \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* her into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of her \w lovers|strong="H0157"\w*, into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w Assyrians|strong="H1121"\w*, upon whom she \w doted|strong="H5689"\w*.

These \w discovered|strong="H1540"\w* her \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w*: they \w took|strong="H3947"\w* her \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* and her \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*, and \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* her with the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*: and she became \w famous|strong="H8034"\w* among \w women|strong="H0802"\w*; for they had \w executed|strong="H6213"\w* \w judgment|strong="H8196"\w* upon her.\f + \fr 23.10 \ft famous: Heb. a name\f*

And when her \w sister|strong="H0269"\w* \w Aholibah|strong="H0172"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \add this\add*, she was more \w corrupt|strong="H7843"\w* in her inordinate \w love|strong="H5691"\w* than she, and in her \w whoredoms|strong="H8457"\w* more than her \w sister|strong="H0269"\w* in \add her\add* \w whoredoms|strong="H2183"\w*.\f + \fr 23.11 \ft she was…: Heb. she corrupted her inordinate love more than, etc\f*\f + \fr 23.11 \ft more than…: Heb. more than the whoredoms of her sister\f*

She \w doted|strong="H5689"\w* upon the \w Assyrians|strong="H1121"\w* \add her\add* \w neighbours|strong="H7138"\w*, \w captains|strong="H6346"\w* and \w rulers|strong="H5461"\w* \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* most \w gorgeously|strong="H4358"\w*, \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w* \w riding|strong="H7392"\w* upon \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, all of them \w desirable|strong="H2531"\w* young \w men|strong="H0970"\w*.
Then I \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* that she was \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w*, \add that\add* they \add took\add* \w both|strong="H8147"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*,

And \add that\add* she \w increased|strong="H3254"\w* her \w whoredoms|strong="H8457"\w*: for when she \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* \w pourtrayed|strong="H2707"\w* upon the \w wall|strong="H7023"\w*, the \w images|strong="H6754"\w* of the \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w* \w pourtrayed|strong="H2710"\w* with \w vermilion|strong="H8350"\w*,

\w Girded|strong="H2289"\w* with \w girdles|strong="H0232"\w* upon their \w loins|strong="H4975"\w*, \w exceeding|strong="H5628"\w* in dyed \w attire|strong="H2871"\w* upon their \w heads|strong="H7218"\w*, all of them \w princes|strong="H7991"\w* to look \w to|strong="H4758"\w*, after the \w manner|strong="H1823"\w* of the \w Babylonians|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Chaldea|strong="H3778"\w*, the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of their \w nativity|strong="H4138"\w*:

And as soon as she \w saw|strong="H4758"\w* them with her \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, she \w doted|strong="H5689"\w* upon them, and \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* unto them into \w Chaldea|strong="H3778"\w*.\f + \fr 23.16 \ft as soon…: Heb. at the sight of her eyes\f*

And the \w Babylonians|strong="H1121"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to her into the \w bed|strong="H4904"\w* of \w love|strong="H1730"\w*, and they \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w* her with their \w whoredom|strong="H8457"\w*, and she was \w polluted|strong="H2930"\w* with them, and her \w mind|strong="H5315"\w* was \w alienated|strong="H3363"\w* from them.\f + \fr 23.17 \ft Babylonians: Heb. children of Babel\f*\f + \fr 23.17 \ft alienated: Heb. loosed, or, disjointed\f*

So she \w discovered|strong="H1540"\w* her \w whoredoms|strong="H8457"\w*, and \w discovered|strong="H1540"\w* her \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w*: then my \w mind|strong="H5315"\w* was \w alienated|strong="H3363"\w* from her, like as my \w mind|strong="H5315"\w* was \w alienated|strong="H5361"\w* from her \w sister|strong="H0269"\w*.

Yet she \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w* her \w whoredoms|strong="H8457"\w*, in calling to \w remembrance|strong="H2142"\w* the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of her \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*, wherein she had played the \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

For she \w doted|strong="H5689"\w* upon their \w paramours|strong="H6370"\w*, whose \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \add is as\add* the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* of \w asses|strong="H2543"\w*, and whose \w issue|strong="H2231"\w* \add is like\add* the \w issue|strong="H2231"\w* of \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*.

Thus thou calledst to \w remembrance|strong="H6485"\w* the \w lewdness|strong="H2154"\w* of thy \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*, in \w bruising|strong="H6213"\w* thy \w teats|strong="H1717"\w* by the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* for the \w paps|strong="H7699"\w* of thy \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*.

¶ Therefore, O \w Aholibah|strong="H0172"\w*, thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Behold, I will raise \w up|strong="H5782"\w* thy \w lovers|strong="H0157"\w* against thee, from whom thy \w mind|strong="H5315"\w* is \w alienated|strong="H5361"\w*, and I will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* them against thee on every \w side|strong="H5439"\w*;

The \w Babylonians|strong="H1121"\w*, and all the \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*, \w Pekod|strong="H6489"\w*, and \w Shoa|strong="H7772"\w*, and \w Koa|strong="H6970"\w*, \add and\add* all the \w Assyrians|strong="H1121"\w* with them: all of them \w desirable|strong="H2531"\w* young \w men|strong="H0970"\w*, \w captains|strong="H6346"\w* and \w rulers|strong="H5461"\w*, great \w lords|strong="H7991"\w* and \w renowned|strong="H7121"\w*, all of them \w riding|strong="H7392"\w* upon \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*.

And they shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* against thee with \w chariots|strong="H2021"\w*, \w wagons|strong="H7393"\w*, and \w wheels|strong="H1534"\w*, and with an \w assembly|strong="H6951"\w* of \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \add which\add* shall \w set|strong="H7760"\w* against thee \w buckler|strong="H6793"\w* and \w shield|strong="H4043"\w* and \w helmet|strong="H6959"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*: and I will \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them, and they shall \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* thee according to their \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*.

And I will \w set|strong="H5414"\w* my \w jealousy|strong="H7068"\w* against thee, and they shall \w deal|strong="H6213"\w* \w furiously|strong="H2534"\w* with thee: they shall take \w away|strong="H5493"\w* thy \w nose|strong="H0639"\w* and thine \w ears|strong="H0241"\w*; and thy \w remnant|strong="H0319"\w* shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*: they shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* thy \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* and thy \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*; and thy \w residue|strong="H0319"\w* shall be \w devoured|strong="H0398"\w* by the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.

They shall also \w strip|strong="H6584"\w* thee out of thy \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*, and take \w away|strong="H3947"\w* thy \w fair|strong="H8597"\w* \w jewels|strong="H3627"\w*.\f + \fr 23.26 \ft fair…: Heb. instruments of thy decking\f*

Thus will I make thy \w lewdness|strong="H2154"\w* to \w cease|strong="H7673"\w* from thee, and thy \w whoredom|strong="H2184"\w* \add brought\add* from the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: so that thou shalt not lift \w up|strong="H5375"\w* thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* unto them, nor \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* any more.

For thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Behold, I will \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* thee into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \add of them\add* whom thou \w hatest|strong="H8130"\w*, into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \add of them\add* from whom thy \w mind|strong="H5315"\w* is \w alienated|strong="H5361"\w*:

And they shall \w deal|strong="H6213"\w* with thee \w hatefully|strong="H8135"\w*, and shall take \w away|strong="H3947"\w* all thy \w labour|strong="H3018"\w*, and shall \w leave|strong="H5800"\w* thee \w naked|strong="H5903"\w* and \w bare|strong="H6181"\w*: and the \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w* of thy \w whoredoms|strong="H2183"\w* shall be \w discovered|strong="H1540"\w*, both thy \w lewdness|strong="H2154"\w* and thy \w whoredoms|strong="H8457"\w*.

I will \w do|strong="H6213"\w* these \add things\add* unto thee, because thou hast gone a \w whoring|strong="H2181"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, \add and\add* because thou art \w polluted|strong="H2930"\w* with their \w idols|strong="H1544"\w*.

Thou hast \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of thy \w sister|strong="H0269"\w*; therefore will I \w give|strong="H5414"\w* her \w cup|strong="H3563"\w* into thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Thou shalt \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* of thy \w sister’s|strong="H0269"\w* \w cup|strong="H3563"\w* \w deep|strong="H6013"\w* and \w large|strong="H7342"\w*: thou shalt be laughed to \w scorn|strong="H6712"\w* and had in \w derision|strong="H3933"\w*; it \w containeth|strong="H3557"\w* \w much|strong="H4767"\w*.

Thou shalt be \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* with \w drunkenness|strong="H7943"\w* and \w sorrow|strong="H3015"\w*, with the \w cup|strong="H3563"\w* of \w astonishment|strong="H8047"\w* and \w desolation|strong="H8077"\w*, with the \w cup|strong="H3563"\w* of thy \w sister|strong="H0269"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*.

Thou shalt even \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* it and suck \add it\add* \w out|strong="H4680"\w*, and thou shalt \w break|strong="H1633"\w* the \w sherds|strong="H2789"\w* thereof, and pluck \w off|strong="H5423"\w* thine own \w breasts|strong="H7699"\w*: for I have \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \add it\add*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.

Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Because thou hast \w forgotten|strong="H7911"\w* me, and \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* me \w behind|strong="H0310"\w* thy \w back|strong="H1458"\w*, therefore \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* thou also thy \w lewdness|strong="H2154"\w* and thy \w whoredoms|strong="H8457"\w*.

¶ The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* moreover unto me; \w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, wilt thou \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* \w Aholah|strong="H0170"\w* and \w Aholibah|strong="H0172"\w*? yea, \w declare|strong="H5046"\w* unto them their \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w*;\f + \fr 23.36 \ft judge: or, plead for\f*

That they have committed \w adultery|strong="H5003"\w*, and \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \add is\add* in their \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, and with their \w idols|strong="H1544"\w* have they committed \w adultery|strong="H5003"\w*, and have also caused their \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, whom they \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* unto me, to pass for them \w through|strong="H5674"\w* \add the fire\add*, to \w devour|strong="H0402"\w* \add them\add*.

Moreover this they have \w done|strong="H6213"\w* unto me: they have \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w* my \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w* in the same \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, and have \w profaned|strong="H2490"\w* my \w sabbaths|strong="H7676"\w*.

For when they had \w slain|strong="H7819"\w* their \w children|strong="H1121"\w* to their \w idols|strong="H1544"\w*, then they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* the same \w day|strong="H3117"\w* into my \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w* to \w profane|strong="H2490"\w* it; and, lo, thus have they \w done|strong="H6213"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of mine \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

And \w furthermore|strong="H0637"\w*, that ye have \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* for \w men|strong="H0582"\w* to \w come|strong="H0935"\w* from \w far|strong="H4801"\w*, unto whom a \w messenger|strong="H4397"\w* \add was\add* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w*; and, lo, they \w came|strong="H0935"\w*: for whom thou didst \w wash|strong="H7364"\w* thyself, \w paintedst|strong="H3583"\w* thy \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, and \w deckedst|strong="H5710"\w* thyself with \w ornaments|strong="H5716"\w*,\f + \fr 23.40 \ft to come: Heb. coming\f*

And \w satest|strong="H3427"\w* upon a \w stately|strong="H3520"\w* \w bed|strong="H4296"\w*, and a \w table|strong="H7979"\w* \w prepared|strong="H6186"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* it, whereupon thou hast \w set|strong="H7760"\w* mine \w incense|strong="H7004"\w* and mine \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*.\f + \fr 23.41 \ft stately: Heb. honourable\f*

And a \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of a \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w* being at \w ease|strong="H7961"\w* \add was\add* with her: and with the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of the common \w sort|strong="H7230"\w* \add were\add* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w Sabeans|strong="H5436"\w* from the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, which \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w bracelets|strong="H6781"\w* upon their \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, and \w beautiful|strong="H8597"\w* \w crowns|strong="H5850"\w* upon their \w heads|strong="H7218"\w*.\f + \fr 23.42 \ft of the…: Heb. of the multitude of men\f*\f + \fr 23.42 \ft Sabeans: or, drunkards\f*

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* I unto \add her that was\add* \w old|strong="H1087"\w* in \w adulteries|strong="H5004"\w*, Will they now \w commit|strong="H2181"\w* \w whoredoms|strong="H8457"\w* with her, and she \add with them\add*?\f + \fr 23.43 \ft whoredoms…: Heb. her whoredoms\f*

Yet they went \w in|strong="H0935"\w* unto her, as they go \w in|strong="H0935"\w* unto a \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* that playeth the \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w*: so went they \w in|strong="H0935"\w* unto \w Aholah|strong="H0170"\w* and unto \w Aholibah|strong="H0172"\w*, the \w lewd|strong="H2154"\w* \w women|strong="H0802"\w*.

¶ And the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, they shall \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* them after the \w manner|strong="H4941"\w* of \w adulteresses|strong="H5003"\w*, and after the \w manner|strong="H4941"\w* of women that \w shed|strong="H8210"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*; because they \add are\add* \w adulteresses|strong="H5003"\w*, and \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \add is\add* in their \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*.

For thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; I will bring \w up|strong="H5927"\w* a \w company|strong="H6951"\w* upon them, and will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* them to be \w removed|strong="H2189"\w* and \w spoiled|strong="H0957"\w*.\f + \fr 23.46 \ft to be…: Heb. for a removing and spoil\f*

And the \w company|strong="H6951"\w* shall \w stone|strong="H7275"\w* them with \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, and \w dispatch|strong="H1254"\w* them with their \w swords|strong="H2719"\w*; they shall \w slay|strong="H2026"\w* their \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* and their \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*, and burn \w up|strong="H8313"\w* their \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.\f + \fr 23.47 \ft dispatch…: or, single them out\f*

Thus will I cause \w lewdness|strong="H2154"\w* to \w cease|strong="H7673"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, that all \w women|strong="H0802"\w* may be \w taught|strong="H3256"\w* not to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* after your \w lewdness|strong="H2154"\w*.

And they shall \w recompense|strong="H5414"\w* your \w lewdness|strong="H2154"\w* upon you, and ye shall \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* the \w sins|strong="H2399"\w* of your \w idols|strong="H1544"\w*: and ye shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.
